expected.text: This weapon deals primarily Radiation damage.
Primary fire shoots six continuous beams.

children.text: Tied with Convectrix and Phage for the highest fire rate of all shotguns.
Consumes 0.5 ammo per tick of damage.

expected.text: Alternate Fire charges the weapon to fire a large plasma bomb that explodes in a 4.8 meter radius, which then releases 5 seeking projectiles.

children.text: The longer the charge is held down, the more damage is dealt by the explosion and its projectiles.
Plasma bomb and seeking projectiles have a guaranteed Impact proc.
Initial hit and explosion apply status separately.
Explosion does not need direct line of sight to deal damage and will penetrate walls.

unexpected: Innate punch through does not apply to surfaces
